author: stefan2
msg: Fix a membuffer cache bug introduced in 1.8:  Trying to make room
for the new contents of an existing key / item may remove the old
contents and, thus, the old index entry.  Before manually removing
the entry, we must check whether it still exists.

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  Bump SVN version number to 1.9
to allow tests to distinguish between format 7 and format 6

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  Add svn_cache__has_key() function
to our cache API.  Semantically, it is a stripped-down version
of svn_cache__get() but without actually copying and returning
(svn_cache__vtable_t): add has_key entry to cache vtable
(svn_cache__has_key): implement new API function as forwarding
inprocess_cache_has_key): implement has_key for in-process caches
membuffer_cache_has_key): implemente the has_key core functionality
